name: Wendy the Witch in "Mind Your Damned Business!"
name_original: Wendy the Witch in "Mind Your Damned Business!"
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 44: Compo

Theme: Your Life is Currency

You are Wendy the Witch, who has been tasked by Beelzebub himself to summon him for world domination. But, this summoning requires the sacrifice of blood...

How to Play:

    - Kill enemies by drawing a blood circle around them using left click.
    - Drawing a blood circle drains your life, but killing enemies restores it.
    - You can slow enemies down and block projectiles with a barrier spell using right click.
    - Killing enemies gives you mana. Reach 1000 mana to summon ya boi Satan.     - Clicking on your hut will allow you to purchase upgrades.
    - Farms provide a slow supply of extra blood.
    - Cauldrons provide a steady supply of mana.
    - When in a tight spot, the spacebar will kill all enemies on screen at the cost of 25 Blood.
